dmca.title: Copyright complaint ltr2.doc
dmca.body:
t

  _____  

From: Out of Nowhere - Don [mailto:info@outofnowhere.net] 
Sent: Friday, March 03, 2006 7:09 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: speedy3@speedlabs.com
Subject: Copyright complaint ltr2.doc



March 3, 2006

 

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

George Poletes, Corporate Counsel

1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110,

Dallas, TX 75207

 

Dear Mr. Poletes,

 

On this website,
http://www.microfuzion.co.uk/proddetail.asp?prod=MFZLAZUNIT, this company is
displaying our trademark image without our permission. We have contacted the
company and requested they cease displaying the image and they blatantly
refuse to respect our property and rights. I have enclosed copies of my
correspondence to this company and their rude responses.

 

A simple WHOIS search of this website will show that microfuzion.co.uk is
registered by Vivo Technologies Limited. Their address and telephone numbers
and email addresses are attached.

 

You are hosting their website on your servers. Microfuzion.co.uk's DNS
servers are ns13.tokios.com and ns14.tokios.com. The IP address for
ns13.tokios.com is 211.168.56.69 which is owned by The Planet. 

 

Discontinue hosting our logo immediately! Failure to discontinue hosting our
logo will result in immediate legal action against your company!

 

I am presently working in the field and I am available for contact through
my cellular telephone (817-291-2396).

 

Regards,



Carl Fors, B.S., M.S., President

Speed Measurement Laboratories, Inc.

FCC Licensee-RS Radiolocation KNNN839

Certified Master Radar Laser Instructor

Member International Association of Chiefs of Police

 

cc: Auerbach Albert, & Gold, L.C.

 

CF/dh
